EmailTemplate.description: Send once we begin MLS integration phase
EmailTemplate.name: MLS Integration - Next Steps- Revamped Emails
EmailTemplate.subject: TORCHx MLS INTEGRATION – Next Steps:
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {Client_First_Name__ },
We have some great news! We’re beginning the MLS integration phase of your TORCHx website!
What we'll do:
Connect with the MLS database, which contains all of the properties we list on your website Pull in any properties you wish to have displayed on the site Remove any properties you do not wish to display
If you have any additional questions, feel free to give us a call at
1 (888) 428-9659. We're available Monday - Friday from 8:00 a.m. – 7:00 p.m. EST
You can find 24/7 support here:
INSERT SINGLE PAGE LINK
Thank you for choosing TORCHx. We appreciate your business!
{!User.FirstName}
TORCHx Support
(888) 428-9659
